[Slotless]

Cost 6 Fame

Prerequisites Tier 3 with any faction, @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-society-boons.Hireling, Expert]{Expert Hireling}

Effect When you gain this boon, select one @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-society-boons.Hireling]{Hireling} boon you possess. The selected ally adds a second Lore skill to the list of skill checks they can attempt. In addition, select one skill feat whose prerequisite is being trained in one of the hireling's selected skills. The hireling gains the benefits of that skill feat when attempting skill checks.

Special You can purchase this boon multiple times. Each time you purchase this boon, you must apply its benefits to a different Hireling boon.
